text: Silayev, also spelt Silaev and Silajev, may refer to: * Aleksandr Silayev (1928–2005), a Soviet spring canoer * Boris Silayev (born 1946), a Kyrgyz politician * Ivan Silayev (born 1930), a Soviet, and later, Russian politician * Ivan Silayev (ice hockey) (born 1996), Russian ice hockey player == See also == * Silayev's Government, Ivan Silayev's Soviet Cabinet
title: Silayev (surname)
